content:
Your private cottage awaits! Tastefully decorated, the living room/bedroom combination features an intimate Duraflame log burning fireplace and cozy queen bed. Please bring your own Duraflame logs.

1 Queen Bed
375 square feet / rate is for 2 people

STARTING FROM $100 PER NIGHT
* Excluding taxes, $3 per person per night Recreation Fee and 19% Service Charge.
